phrases: When we lived at the monastery,
it was easy to tell whether Rin was home or not.
So if he happened to be late for dinner, we ate in silence...
I bet you got into a fight again...
It is okay for me to have something to do too!
You are not chasing girls for sure.
It says, Satan's kin must die.
When we arrived, one of the victims was still able to squeeze out a few words.
This web is of magical origin.
It covered their bodies completely and hardened into stone.
There is a thin protective layer around their bodies.
They must have chanted protective charms when they were attacked.
But its efficiency is decreasing little by little.
They have about eight hours left.
We are looking for a compound that could dissolve it,
but we have never seen anything similar, so we do not really know where to start.
You are the one they want!
So they should come after me!
And that is what they want!
I swore to Father that I would protect you!
Why cannot you listen to me?!
I can look after myself, I do not need your protection!
We do not have time for all this bullshit!
You were after me from the beginning, right?!
You should know how it feels...
To lose the ones close to you.
I will not just kill you.
You will enjoy the suffering I was put through.
I got to go after you when you pull stunts like this!
Demons... and those related to demons must die.
Do not play stupid with me.
The monastery was full of it!
Your logic is not even worth analyzing.
This is just a common spiderweb that can be found anywhere.
The message written on the wall was in your mother tongue.
Also, there are only a few who know that my brother and I have demon blood.
No matter how you look, as long as your judgment is clouded you will not find the truth.
You will come with me to the Academy.
Let us hear your truth there.
And he holds a grudge against Rin.
I do not think he was there by chance.
I heard he quit and returned to his homeland.
But who knows how much of what Mephisto says is true...
Wait, on the other side of that portal opened earlier with a key...
You said there was a laboratory for the research of artificial life, right?
Connected corpses of humans and animals are often used in
artificial life research, or as Naberius.
There is a connection to professor Neuhaus.
But artificial life research is strictly prohibited by the Vatican.
Where do you think you are going?
I have got to stop him.
You cannot use the Demon-Slaying Blade.
How do you intend to fight?
I will ask the other teachers for support too.
I do not want anyone to get hurt because of me anymore!
You are not going anywhere today, that is for sure.
If you think you can always have it your way, you are wrong.
Or will you knock me down again?
With that demonic power of yours?
Hey, Yukio, what is with all the fuss?
I have the duty to protect Rin.
I will leave the rest to your.
The tracer's signal is coming from below.
Use the charms I gave you earlier as your last resort.
If you are attacked with that web, secure your breathing using chants.
I see you are still groggy!
You still have some tranqs in your blood.
What the hell is wrong with him?
I guess it is called worry.
You are not worth shit if you go there
without knowing how to use a single flame the way you want to.
Do not you get that you having trouble with your flames means trouble for everyone?
If you learned to control them properly, no one would be
afraid, worried or suffering because of you.
If you get it, use these.
This is not the time for training!
This are not training, this is the real thing.
These candles are the people important to you.
If you cannot control your flames, they will all die.
It does not matter if it is training or not.
As long as you cannot prove that you can control your flames,
no one's going to trust you.
Control your flames with your will!
I will head there right away.
In the boys' dormitory of the True Cross Academy.
According to student witnesses, it is a masked man.
Most of the students managed to escape,
but a few are still in the cafeteria.
Including the students of the Exorcist cram school.
He said no one is to enter if we want the hostages alive.
No one except the son of Satan.
It is a brave act to assault my Academy.
Let us make him regret it.
Do not play with fire in the middle of the night.
Would you care to explain the meaning of this?
The Vatican has placed a warrant for you.
There is a suspicion that you might be engaged in forbidden artificial life research.
What are you talking about, I wonder?
If you have something to say, you can say it in the Vatican's prison.
I will not run away or hide.
However, it makes me wonder your timing for this.
What on earth is going on?
I am going to at least find out if there is more than one intruder in there.
Do not let anyone call my brother!
There is no one in the other classrooms.
Why are you binding only us?
I will kill everyone connected to the son of Satan.
Can you hear me, son of Satan?
What have you done to my friends?!
At least not until you arrive.
He wants to call Rin here?
Do you want another taste of the pain of losing someone?
I told you that I would kill them if anyone but the son of Satan entered.
This is your punishment for not listening.
It is more interesting with the brother here too.
You have come, son of Satan?
You cannot do anything without your sword!
You are lookin' at the wrong guy.
Do you think you have won?
If you cannot use your sword...
You must not use your flames again, Rin!
I have to learn this... and it is now or never!
And I have got to control them!
I was supposed to protect you.
You are way too early for that.
I was supposed to be able to protect you...
Do not get in the way!
You are the one in the way!
You were trying to use that demon to attack Rin!
Start explaining what the hell's going on!
They have minor injuries, but none requiring hospitalization.
I wanted Father Fujimoto to see how much you have grown...
By the way, where is Yukio?
There is someone who would like to meet you.
I am glad to see you, Grandson.
I have not asked for that!
Is this the best you can do, son of Satan?
It is alright kokoro ni mo nai
sakete toorenai michi wa itsu kara ka konna datta
haite suteru hodo ni taikutsu datta
kizu darake ni natte try for pride
haite sutete mo kekkyoku taisetsu nanda
harewatari michi ni hikari wa sashita
Let us fight osore wa nai
Dark side in my heart is
the unerasable sadness of the past.
It is alright if I do not really mean it,
so I fire my blasters and stretch out my hands.
Since when has my way been unavoidable like this?
And now there is no one left...
I cry for my pride, I cannot bear it.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
An aria of love resounding through
this distorted reality of twisted prayers.
My dreams and tomorrow are collapsing,
because throwing away the lies would be boring.
try it for your pride, covered in wounds.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
Even so, I sing the song of love and
let its wish reach through this distorted world
to build our bonds and the tomorrow to come.
Throwing away the lies was important after all,
because this is my precious life.
Dark cloud in my heart is
disappearing and light is shining on the road I am on.
Let us fight, there is no fear.
mau chou no you ni hirari
koko wa dokoka betsu no sekai
juudaina ayamachi ni mo kizukazu ni
hito kara hito e to tsunagaru
totemo kirei de maru de kinu no ito
kore ga unmei to iu kusari nano ka
I am lightly fluttering in wondrous light
like a dancing butterfly in midair.
Is this place in another world?
My fall is not slowing down so
The numbers that make my head spin
and there I notice a terrible error.
is a shining pale indigo blue wire.
It is beautiful like a thread of silk.
I wonder if it is what they call the chains of fate?
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in this
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in it.
